xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore_description=IPTC Photo Metadata provides data about photographs and the values can be processed by software. Each individual metadata entity is called a property and they are grouped into Administrative, Descriptive and Rights Related properties.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore_label=IPTC Core Properties

xmp_property.name: IntellectualGenre
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/IntellectualGenre_description=Enter a term to describe the nature of this image in terms of its intellectual or journalistic characteristics (examples at: http://www.newscodes.org/)
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/IntellectualGenre_label=Intellectual Genre

xmp_property.name: Scene
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/Scene_description=Enter only values from the IPTC Scene NewsCodes Controlled Vocabulary (see: http://www.newscodes.org/)
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/Scene_label=IPTC Scene Code

xmp_property.name: Location
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/Location_description=Enter the name of the Sublocation pictured in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/Location_label=Sublocation

xmp_property.name: CountryCode
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CountryCode_description=Enter the 2 or 3 letter ISO 3166 Country Code of the Country pictured in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CountryCode_label=ISO Country Code

xmp_property.name: SubjectCode
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/SubjectCode_description=Enter only values from the IPTC Subject NewsCode Controlled Vocabulary (see: http://www.newscodes.org/)
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/SubjectCode_label=IPTC Subject Code

xmp_field.name: CiAdrExtadr
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrExtadr_label=Address
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrExtadr_description=Enter Address for the person that created this image

xmp_field.name: CiAdrCity
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrCity_label=City
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrCity_description=Enter the City for the address of the person that created this image

xmp_field.name: CiAdrRegion
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrRegion_label=State/Province
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrRegion_description=Enter the State for the address of the person that created this image

xmp_field.name: CiAdrPcode
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrPcode_label=Postal Code
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrPcode_description=Enter the Postal Code for the address of the person that created this imag

xmp_field.name: CiAdrCtry
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrCtry_label=Country
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiAdrCtry_description=Enter the Country name for the address of the person that created this image

xmp_field.name: CiTelWork
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiTelWork_label=Phone(s)
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiTelWork_description=Enter the work Phone number(s) for the person that created this image, using the international format, such as +1 (123) 456789

xmp_field.name: CiEmailWork
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiEmailWork_label=E-Mail(s)
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiEmailWork_description=Enter the work Email address(es) for the person that created this image, such as name@domain.com

xmp_field.name: CiUrlWork
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiUrlWork_label=Website(s)
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpCore/CiUrlWork_description=Enter the work Web URL(s) for the person that created this image, such as http://www.domain.com/
